content.p: At University of Nottingham Malaysiaâ€™s School of Languages, we equip students with essential language skills and academic support to thrive in a globalised world. We offer a variety of foreign language modules, along with English and academic study skills programmes, designed to complement degree programmes across the university. Our mission is to enhance students' communication skills, critical thinking, and academic performance, giving them a competitive edge in their studies and future careers. Our modules are open to all students across the university, including undergraduates, postgraduates, and international students aiming to improve their English proficiency or enhance their academic skills. We also collaborate with external partners to offer customised language programmes designed for specific professional or academic needs. The School of Languages is dedicated to providing a personalised, high-quality learning experience. Our state-of-the-art language labs are equipped with advanced facilities to support immersive language learning. With small class sizes and interactive teaching methods, we ensure that every student receives the individual attention they need to excel. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8012
